t: Travel and Hospitality | AWS for Industries
s: Historically, travel and hospitality companies relied on loyalty programs to do exactly that—build loyalty. However, a McKinsey & Company 2023 report shows that loyalty is in decline. Now, customers often belong to three to four different loyalty programs, rather than devoting all or most of their spending to a single brand...
